title.rendered: Men’s Running Tops, Sport Shirt Long Sleeve T-shirt Gym Tee for Fitness Workout Jogging

content.rendered:
Product details

Material Composition
92% Polyester, 8% Elastane
Care Instructions
Machine Wash
Closure Type
Pull On
Neck Style
Round Neck

About this item

  • 1.Excellent Flexibility For Any Movement: The gym tops men is designed with high elastic fabric offers excellent comfort and full range of movement to stretch your muscle. The sports t-shirt with super elasticity provide maximum balance between freedom of movement and muscles, keep you comfortable.
  • 2.Instantaneous absorption of sweat & Prevent Body Odor: The running tee shirt feature breathable and wicking polyester fabric which will absorb sweat from exercise instantly, stay away from unpleasant smells to keep you dry and cozy.
  • 3.Stretchy and Breathable:The sport hoodie is designed to be lightweight and breathable, preventing overheating, it moves with your limbs and torso.
  • 4.Ideal Sport Partner: This base layer tops is ideal for outdoor and indoor sports like: gym training, running, cycling, hiking, fishing, jogging. Also it’s a great gift for sports lover.
  • 5.Customer Satisfaction Guarantee: Any problem with the fitness tops men, please Visit Your Orders to contact us. We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure quality, fit, and comfort.
